channel.title: Case ids
channel.description: Hey, how to make the case show then i click on a object ? or an click able image ?

item.title: Case ids
item.dc:creator: @suber_man suber man
item.description:
@suber_man wrote:

Mendorphins:

Basically, he/she wants to hover over a sprite, area or object and it display the case or action button ID.

ok i didnt know that because of his/her short topic.
some people understand that and some people can actually understand what she/he said.
thankyou

Read full topic

item.title: Case ids
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Basically, he/she wants to hover over a sprite, area or object and it display the case or action button ID.

For example, “what’s the case/action button ID for the exit cross on the character design interface? Oh I know, I’ll just log on a see.”

hovers mouse over the exit cross

Read full topic

item.title: Case ids
item.dc:creator: @suber_man suber man
item.description:
@suber_man wrote:

don’t make short topics like this.
you need to explain better what you mean.
most of the people can’t understand you and don’t want to help.
thankyou i hope you will add some more information about your qeustion.

Read full topic

item.title: Case ids
item.dc:creator: @Retard_Monkey Retard Monkey
item.description:
@Retard_Monkey wrote:

Lolwut?
If I understand you correctly, you’re asking how to add functions to an object or… something?
Surely this could simply be achieved through:

Case OBJECTID; p.teleportTo(x,y,z); break;

Well, at least that’s the skeleton… Obviously this teleport a player when activated…
Just edit it to suit your needs, it should be able to send messages, add/remove items, give exp, all that jazz, so yeah…

Read full topic
